title: CURATED ICE
description: CURATED ICE - is an extensive sound library containing 128 unique files of Ice (Breaking, Movement, Impacts, Friction, Handling, Crashes, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED ICE - is an extensive sound library containing 128 unique files of Ice (Breaking, Movement, Impacts, Friction, Handling, Crashes, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions ranging from ice machines, parks, forests, lakes and glaciers to scrapping, breaking and chipping. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz / 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  128 Unique .wav files of Ice in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 128

Number of Audio Cues: 128

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 79

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/15vRuNoiymHQ6krzmRP5HbI1egBhSV6OJ/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-ice-demo?si=56e09da0db79400b81ed1ea3b1d400f1&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
